item.title: The Initial Page
item.description: Create Personal WebLog with hugo and Github Page Some errors and solutions Themes & CSS In fact, that’s my second time creating this repo. In the first trip, some issues appeared with themes. Basically, it is because CSS missing (loading error) so the web looks strange. And my solution is to turn to another theme, fortunately it’s work. // Maybe i will take more research on this problem, but now I just ignore it.
